tips.title: Deep Watering Technique
tips.description: Water plants deeply but less frequently to encourage strong root development. Aim for 1-2 inches per week.

tips.title: Spring Fertilizing Schedule
tips.description: Begin fertilizing in early spring when new growth appears. Use a balanced, slow-release fertilizer for best results.

tips.title: Winter Plant Protection
tips.description: Wrap tender plants in burlap and mulch around the base to protect from freezing temperatures.

tips.title: Summer Pruning Tips
tips.description: Prune spring-flowering shrubs right after blooming ends. This ensures next year's flower buds have time to develop.

tips.title: Natural Pest Control
tips.description: Encourage beneficial insects with native plants. Ladybugs, lacewings, and birds are natural pest controllers.

tips.title: Fall Garden Cleanup
tips.description: Remove diseased plant material and fallen leaves to prevent pest and disease issues next season.
